comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: If the prices are correct then I have to admit that I have not seen a cheaper price for 1 year of Netflix UHD which is only $7 for one year - is this correct or is it a mistake? I don't know how anyone can make money legally selling something at such low prices if we assume that it's not about hacked accounts...?

comments.author: Blockchain Mart
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on July 24, 2022, 01:41:00 PMIf the prices are correct then I have to admit that I have not seen a cheaper price for 1 year of Netflix UHD which is only $7 for one year - is this correct or is it a mistake? I don't know how anyone can make money legally selling something at such low prices if we assume that it's not about hacked accounts...?That Is Not A Mistake Actually With Correct Discounts & limited time offers And Some Vpn That Is PossibleThose Accounts Are Made By Us And Are Fully Warrantied

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Blockchain Mart on July 24, 2022, 04:51:36 PMThat Is Not A Mistake Actually With Correct Discounts & limited time offers And Some Vpn That Is PossibleThose Accounts Are Made By Us And Are Fully WarrantiedFrom my perspective, it seems a bit unreal, because regular Netflix HD costs EUR 8 per month in my country. Regardless of the fact that you offer a guarantee, I hope that these are not those accounts that constantly have problems and need constant replacements.The advice is to move your topic to the appropriate board - just check for move button and move here -> https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=234.0

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: I found out why this user sells all of the above at such cheap prices - the accounts are not personalized as he claimed, he sells the same account to different people. In addition, he refused to return my money and also changed the password for the streaming service he sold me. I do not recommend doing business with this user.

comments.author: spiker777
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on July 27, 2022, 10:24:20 AMI found out why this user sells all of the above at such cheap prices - the accounts are not personalized as he claimed, he sells the same account to different people. In addition, he refused to return my money and also changed the password for the streaming service he sold me. I do not recommend doing business with this user.the prices were already suspicious even you said that yourself above. plus he's a newbie without any rep. you shouldn't have trusted him and bought anything from him without any vouches. hopefully you didn't lose a lot of money.Alternatively https://www.bitrefill.com is a very trustworthy and famous platform for buying gift cards. you can easily buy a netflix gift card there with crypto paying.
